channel.title: (508) How do i make a client?
channel.description:
i have a 508 source that i finshed editing and a regular ip changer client. can anyone explain to me how to make that source into one whole client? so i dont have to click "run" (source) then have to click "run" (client)
Just So it can be one client. =] Thanks
